tasks.instruction: Find the most-cited paper that cites the paper 'Segment Anything' on Google Scholar. Stop at the screen showing the paper abstract.
rubrics: Opened a search engine or a browser
Viewed multiple citing papers and there citations
Found the most-cited paper amoung the viewed citing papers
Stopped at a screen that shows the paper's abstract
human_reference_operations: tap on the search bar in google scholar
swipe up to see more citing papers
swipe up to see more citing papers
tap 'Visual instruction tuning' (which is being cited 4600+ times)

tasks.instruction: Find at least three representative survey papers on LLM agents on Google Scholar, and add their titles to the Notes.
rubrics: Opened a search engine or a browser
Searched for suervey papers on LLM agents
Correctly identify at least one survey papers
Added a note with the titles of the found survey papers
human_reference_operations: tap on the search bar in Google Scholar
type the titles of the three survey papers into the note

tasks.instruction: I have some onions, beef, and potatoes in my refrigerator. Can you find me a Chinese-style recipe that uses all three ingredients and can be prepared in under an hour? And find me a video tutorial on YouTube for that. Stop at the screen displaying the video.
rubrics: Searched for Chinese recipes using onions, beef, and potatoes under 1 hour
Searched for a video tutorial for the chosen recipe
Stopped at a screen showing the video
human_reference_operations: type 'Chinese recipe with onions beef potatoes under 1 hour'
type the name of the recipe
tap on a relevant tutorial video

tasks.instruction: Can you check the MacDonald's APP to see if there are any Rewards or Deals including Spicy McCrispy. If so, help me add that to Mobile Order (Do not pay yet, I will do it myself). And then check the pickup location and get directions on Google Maps. Stop at the screen showing the route.
rubrics: Identified a deal for Spicy McCrispy (if available)
Added Spicy McCrispy to the Mobile Order (no payment)
Got directions to the pickup location, stopped at the route screen
human_reference_operations: swipe up to find available deals
tap Home (checked the pickup location)open Maps app

tasks.instruction: Find three detailed user reviews of the Bose QC45 headphones from Amazon. Summarize the general sentiment in the Notes.
rubrics: Found at least one user review
Created a new note summarizing the general sentiment based on the reviews
human_reference_operations: swipe up to see user reviews
swipe up to see more reviews from different users
